content: isn t the pattern pixie tales just simple adorable i believe you will love it as much as i do it s moderately easy fast and has such a nice & soft texture that makes a blanket nicely squishy the pattern will look gorgeous even using one solid color or you can use self striping yarn with long color changes like mandala sirdar color wheel sirdar snuggly pattercake or caron cakes etc as well as long gradient or ombre yarn using this pattern you can create any size square blanket or cushion cover wouldn t be a nice set the pattern is appropriate for the advanced beginning level crocheters for more experienced ones this would be a relaxing project the pattern includes the detailed descriptions a stitch guide video tutorial and pictures to demonstrate the final result **stitches ** magic_ring double_crochet back/front post double_crochet popcorn **additional information ** the pattern includes perfect granny - practical solution the method that keeps the beginning ch3 in the corner you can see a video tutorial on youtube 1 **yarn hook & approximate size ** the pixie tales pattern sample was created using the following yarn **yarn** mandala baby pixie hollow **hook size** 4 mm **sample size** 32 3 in 82 cm square **amount of yarn used for sample** almost 3 skeins / 440 g / 1730 yds 1584 m you can use any yarn & matching size hook you like that suits your project happy crocheting 1 https //youtu be/v8kkn1voob0
